long_description: Walk, hike and explore winter terrain with confidence in the Kahtoola K-10 Hiking Crampons, a light, flexible traction system designed for use with everyday footwear. LeafSpring(TM) extender bars and independent front and rear straps allow the system to flex naturally with any footwear. Adjustable, water-resistant polyester straps with a quick-release buckles make the crampons easy to put on and take off. Constructed of steel for sturdy use; steel spikes are 3/4 in. long for deep-biting traction. Kahtoola K-10 Hiking Crampons offer tool-free length adjustment; one size fits most.
short_description: Walk, hike and explore winter terrain with confidence in the Kahtoola K-10 Hiking Crampons, a light, flexible traction system designed for use with everyday footwear.
